trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe TreeNodeCollection é usada para armazenar e gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses the TreeNodeCollection class in two of its properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controle usa a classe TreeNodeCollection em duas das suas propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: It stores its root nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property and its selected nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ele armazena seus nós raiz no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>propriedade e seus nós selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection collection is also used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property to store child nodes (if any).
trans-unit.target: A coleção de TreeNodeCollection também é usada para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>propriedade para armazenar nós filho (se houver).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object directly at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: A classe TreeNodeCollection dá suporte a várias maneiras de acessar os itens na coleção:-Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A>indexador para recuperar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto diretamente em um índice de base zero específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar pela coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Use `foreach` (c#) ou `For Each` (Visual Basic) para iterar pela coleção.

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into an <xref:System.Array> object.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar o conteúdo da coleção em uma <xref:System.Array>objeto.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage the TreeNodeCollection by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: Você pode gerenciar programaticamente o TreeNodeCollection adicionando e removendo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To add nodes to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar nós à coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover nós da coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controle está associado a uma fonte de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>coleções são preenchidas automaticamente cada vez que a associação ocorre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para as coleções entre associações serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind.
trans-unit.target: Para reter essas alterações, atualizar a fonte de dados ou reconstruir manualmente a coleção de cada vez que você associar.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself.
trans-unit.target: O TreeNodeCollection contém propriedades e métodos que permitem que você recupere informações sobre a própria coleção.

trans-unit.source: To find out how many items are in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para descobrir quantos itens estão na coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser determinar se a coleção contém um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>do objeto, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To get the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o índice de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto na coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> classe usando os valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>usando os valores padrão de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root nodes where a parent node (or owner) is not required.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é comumente usado ao criar uma coleção de nós raiz onde um nó pai (ou proprietário) não é necessário.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating a collection of non-root nodes, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Durante a criação de uma coleção de nós de não-raiz, você deve usar o construtor sobrecarregado que usa o `owner` parâmetro, em vez desse construtor, para especificar o nó pai.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> class using the specified parent node (or owner).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> classe usando o nó pai especificado (ou proprietário).

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class using the specified parent node (or owner).
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>classe usando o nó pai especificado (ou proprietário).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of non-root nodes where you need to specify the parent node.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é comumente usado durante a criação de uma coleção de nós de não-raiz em que você precisa especificar o nó pai.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating a collection of root nodes, consider using the default constructor because root nodes do not have a parent node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Durante a criação de uma coleção de nós de raiz, considere usando o construtor padrão porque nós raiz não tem um nó pai.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object that represents the parent node of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto que representa o nó pai da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Acrescenta especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto ao final do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Add para anexar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto ao final da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> especificado

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> allows you to add null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>permite que você adicione referências nulo (Nothing no Visual Basic), bem como duplicata <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode inserir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>em um índice específico usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to append.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a ser acrescentado.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Insere especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> do objeto em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto no local do índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the AddAt method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Use o método AddAt para inserir especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>no índice de base zero especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> allows you to insert null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>permite que você inserir referências nulo (Nothing no Visual Basic), bem como a duplicata <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode acrescentar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto ao final do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero no qual inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: child is .
trans-unit.target: childis .

trans-unit.source: Empties the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esvazia o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Clear method to remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Clear para remover cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To remove an individual node from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para remover um nó individual da coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Contains para determinar se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto está contido em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing the node from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é geralmente usado para testar a existência de uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto antes de executar uma tarefa, como adicionar ou remover o nó da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto está contido na coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto em uma matriz unidimensional compatível de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos, iniciando no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> into the specified zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o método CopyTo para copiar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>especificado com base em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Itens são copiados iniciando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, você pode usar a sintaxe de matriz para acessar os itens em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você também pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz com base em zero de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: A posição na matriz de destino no qual começar a receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Count para determinar o número de itens em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when iterating through a collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada ao fazer a iteração por meio de uma coleção para determinar o limite superior da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é normalmente usada para determinar se uma coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar por meio de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetEnumerator method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método GetEnumerator para criar um enumerador que pode ser iterado facilmente por meio de colocar cada item em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o item atualmente apontado no enumerador, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover para o próximo item.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar mover o enumerador de volta para o início da coleção, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After you create an enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Depois de criar um enumerador ou usar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você também pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto que pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another alternative is to use a `foreach` or `For Each` structure to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Outra alternativa é usar um `foreach` ou `For Each` estrutura para iterar pela coleção.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar por meio de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o método IndexOf para determinar o índice de base zero especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó não está na coleção, o método retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified node appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o nó especificado aparece várias vezes na coleção, o índice da primeira ocorrência será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência de value dentro de , se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: The IsSynchronized property is used to indicate whether access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsSynchronized é usada para indicar se o acesso a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>é sincronizado (thread-safe).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> class and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>classe e é substituído para sempre retornar `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade IsSynchronized, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para acessar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>no índice especificado usando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: O indexador permite que você modifique ou substitua um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto na coleção diretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The collection is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é baseada em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> de objeto o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified node from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Remove para remover o nó especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que seguem esse nó, em seguida, são movidos para cima para preencher a posição vaga nesse tipo.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>pode conter referências nulo (Nothing no Visual Basic), bem como duplicar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode remover um nó em um índice específico usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode remover todos os nós na coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto no local do índice especificado do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object at the specified zero-based index location from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método RemoveAt para remover o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto no local do índice de base zero especificado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que seguem esse nó, em seguida, são movidos para cima para preencher a posição vaga nesse tipo.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>pode conter referências nulo (Nothing no Visual Basic), bem como duplicar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode remover um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode remover todos os nós na coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero do nó a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property provides a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SyncRoot fornece uma versão sincronizada do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>que pode ser usado com a sincronização de código (threading).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>propriedade desta classe sempre retorna `false`, que indica que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>classe não está sincronizada (não thread-safe).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>, not directly on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> itself.
trans-unit.target: Sincronizar o código necessário realizar operações no objeto SyncRoot do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>, não diretamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>em si.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a operação correta de coleções que são derivados de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, ele mantém uma sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object used to store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O objeto retornado nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>objeto usado para armazenar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode bloquear a coleção durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto para um unidimensional compatível <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, começando no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> into the specified zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>especificado com base em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Itens são copiados iniciando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, você pode usar a sintaxe de matriz para acessar os itens em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você também pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: A posição na matriz de destino no qual começar a receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: array is not an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: arraynão é uma matriz de objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto está salvando alterações ao seu estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle está marcado para salvar seu estado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto do salvo anteriormente o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os valores de estado de exibição salvo.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to view state to a <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Salva as alterações para exibir o estado para um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the view state changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que contém as alterações de estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Instrui o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> para controlar alterações em seu estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been called on a server control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois que esse método é chamado em um controle de servidor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>propriedade retornará `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>
